CampaignInfluence.name: CampaignInfluence
CampaignInfluence.description: Represents the association between a campaign and an opportunity in Customizable Campaign Influence.

CampaignId.description: The ID of the campaign that’s related to the opportunity.

CampaignMemberId.description: The ID of the campaign member related to the opportunity. Not available in the UI.

ContactId.description: The ID of the contact on the associated opportunity.

Influence.description: The percentage of the Amount field for the related opportunity that’s attributed to the campaign.

ModelId.description: The ID of the campaign influence model that’s related to the record.

OpportunityContactRoleId.description: The opportunity contact role ID of the related opportunity. Not available in the UI.

OpportunityId.description: The ID of the related opportunity.

RevenueShare.description: The amount of revenue from the related opportunity attributed to the campaign.
